p: Visual analysis of the docking site was performed using Pymol-2.3.3 and the results were validated by using AutoDock Tools-1.5.6 (Morris et al., 1998). Binding interaction analyses of identifying inhibitor and the SARS-CoV-2 Mpro (PDB ID: 6Y84) was done using an online program by using Ligplot analysis (Wallace et al., 1995).
